comments: very interesting, lectures like any lectures but if you ask questions hes very helpful in understanding. book is a must. very intelligent and strong command of subjects, not traditional views , would recommend

This class is easy enough to not have a curve. He won\'t post lec notes until the last min. So you should pay attention in class and remember wut he said so u wont get lost @ home. He lecs are boring but somehow i like the book.
Lecture is pointless, book is not needed, no idea what will be on either of the 2 tests given, TA\'s grade the exams/paper very subjectively. AVOID.

The worst professor I\'ve ever had at Davis, easily. Seems to not have a command of the subject matter whatsoever, which makes him come off as unintelligent. Lectures are painfully boring. Don\'t take him.
